page.title: 17 OUR SCHOOL
page.content: I attend St.Mary's Roman Catholic Middle School for pupils between the ages of nine to thirteen years and who belong to the Catholic church. We have eight periods a day each lasting thirty five minutes. A full lesson is two periods long although for some subjects like French we have one period making up a single lesson. In our school we wear uniform mainly blue in colour. We have a large gymnasium and hall. There is a science laboratory and several large craft rooms. We can have a cooked meal at lunchtimes but because of the cost a lot of people prefer to bring sandwiches instead. I enjoy school very much but am always thankful when I get home and able to finish my homework. I can then relax and enjoy watching television.
